originalText.text: Wow! I booked for vajacial + Brazilian wax without any experience with the vajacial. Cristina has made a believer outta me. I loved the whole experience. Such a treat to my most sacred area. Why haven't I done this before?! She took such great care of me. She's great! Book now! I'll be back for sure.

text.text: Wow! I booked for vajacial + Brazilian wax without any experience with the vajacial. Cristina has made a believer outta me. I loved the whole experience. Such a treat to my most sacred area. Why haven't I done this before?! She took such great care of me. She's great! Book now! I'll be back for sure.

originalText.text: I recently had the pleasure of having a Brazilian sugar wax and a brow lamination with Cristina, and I am beyond impressed! She’s incredibly skilled and attentive, making me feel comfortable throughout the entire process. The sugar waxing was virtually painless, leaving my skin smooth and hair-free. The brow lamination gave my brows a stunning, natural-looking shape that I've always wanted. The results exceeded my expectations, and I can't wait to return for another session. If you're looking for top-notch grooming services, I highly recommend this place.

originalText.text:
ONE STOP SHOP okay ?! Best brow/lash/makeup artist in Dyckman. I also love how she’s professional & makes sure her work is efficient to your preference; want em thick with shape ? No problem. Want it bushy & laminated? No problem.
Definitely worth booking !!

originalText.text: For 3 years my eyebrows were looking horrendous and thin with bold spots. Cristina took one look at my eyebrows and did magic. She has also done my lashes and Brazilian wax a outstanding job. Cristina is a perfectionist and very professional I highly recommend everyone to go see her.

text.text: For 3 years my eyebrows were looking horrendous and thin with bold spots. Cristina took one look at my eyebrows and did magic. She has also done my lashes and Brazilian wax a outstanding job. Cristina is a perfectionist and very professional I highly recommend everyone to go see her.

originalText.text: At 28 years old I had never waxed or laminated my eyebrows. I plucked a few hairs here and there but enjoyed the natural eyebrow look. I finally decided to wax and laminate my eyebrows after coming across the Luna Noire Instagram page. It was easy to schedule an appointment, the technician Cristina was friendly and precise. My face literally changed after our session! From her Instagram page I knew she could give me the look I was going for! My results from eyebrows and lamination lasted me a really long time. I was so happy with the service!
